meanings.definition: To dance or move in a lively or playful manner.
meanings.sent1: The children were poussetting joyfully at the party.
meanings.sent2: She loves poussetting to her favorite songs in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The kittens were poussetting around the room, chasing after a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The leaves in the wind seemed to be poussetting on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The colorful birds were poussetting in the trees, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The act of dancing or moving in a lively or playful manner.
meanings.sent1: His poussetting brought smiles to everyone watching.
meanings.sent2: The poussetting at the carnival was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent3: The poussetting of the puppies in the park was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The waves' poussetting on the shore was calming to watch.
meanings.sent5: The poussetting of the fireflies in the night sky was like a magical dance.
